mapper.select: select categoryName from category where categoryNo = #{categoryNo}
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, categoryno, regDate, view, username) value(#{board.title},#{board.content},#{board.categoryNo},#{board.regDate},#{board.view},#{board.username})
insert into board (title, content, etc, categoryno, regDate, view, username) value(#{board.title},#{board.content},#{board.etc}, #{board.categoryNo},#{board.regDate},#{board.view},#{board.username})
mapper.update: update board set view = #{view} where bno = #{bno}
